billboard 0.0.1
  • Reference
  • Chart types

  • Shiny

Chart types

John Coene

2018-05-13

chartypes.Rmd
# create data
df <- data.frame(x = 1:10, w = runif(10, 0, 5), y = runif(10, 0, 5), z = runif(10, 0, 5))

Bar

df %>%
  b_board(x) %>%
  b_bar(w) %>% 
  b_bar(y, stack = TRUE) %>% 
  b_bar(z, stack= TRUE)

Area

df %>%
  b_board(x) %>%
  b_area(w) %>% 
  b_area(y, stack = TRUE) %>% 
  b_area(z, stack= TRUE)

Scatter

Scatter does stack

df %>%
  b_board(x) %>%
  b_scatter(w) %>% 
  b_scatter(y, stack = TRUE) %>% 
  b_scatter(z, stack= TRUE)

Line

df %>%
  b_board(x) %>%
  b_line(w) %>%
  b_line(y, stack = TRUE) %>% 
  b_line(z, stack = TRUE)

spline

df %>%
  b_board(x) %>%
  b_spline(w) %>%
  b_spline(y, stack = TRUE) %>% 
  b_spline(z, stack = TRUE)

Step

df %>%
  b_board(x) %>%
  b_step(w) %>% 
  b_step(y, stack = TRUE) %>% 
  b_step(z, stack= TRUE)

Area spline

df %>%
  b_board(x) %>%
  b_area_spline(w) %>% 
  b_area_spline(y, stack = TRUE) %>% 
  b_area_spline(z, stack= TRUE)

Step area

df %>%
  b_board(x) %>%
  b_step_area(w) %>% 
  b_step_area(y, stack = TRUE) %>% 
  b_step_area(z, stack= TRUE)

Pie

mtcars %>% 
  mutate(model = rownames(.)) %>% 
  slice(1:10) %>% 
  b_board(model) %>% 
  b_pie(wt)

Donut

mtcars %>% 
  mutate(model = rownames(.)) %>% 
  slice(1:10) %>% 
  b_board(model) %>% 
  b_donut(drat)

Gauge

b_board() %>% 
  b_gauge(27)

Developed by John Coene.
